explanation.poi: We are using points of interests to get the closest estimation for housing. We are NOT storing the location. This is only used to embed our data.

us.title: About us
us.text2: We are a collective wishing to boost territorial dynamic on AI. In total we are more than 80 actors
us.text1: Our members are from different horizons: researchers, academics, entrepreneurs (large companies, digital companies, startups), experts, communities, user-groups, journalists, lawyers, etc...
us.text3: We act on eight commitments: transparency, decompartmentalization, responsibility / traceability, ethics, respect for privacy, governance, scientific and technical culture, human-machine cooperation.

why.title: Why this application
why.text1: The goal of this project is to present Nantais's know-how in artificial intelligence.
why.text2: This application is intended for any kind of public. It explains in a fun way the main principles and thus to demystify the subject.
